jcr:root.courseContent:
It doesn't matter if you're a complete novice or an expert app developerâNOW is the time to hop aboard the Android M bus and grab your golden ticket to app developing heaven (before everyone else does)!
Android M represents a MAMMOTH opportunity. Whether you're looking to boost your income, change your career, or who knowsâ¦ become the next Mark Zuckerberg!
Join thousands of budding app developers, champing at the bit to get started on Google's best, most polished and most easily controlled platform â EVER.
jcr:root.courseObjective: Learn to make Android apps by building real apps including Uber and Instagram clones. Android Wear included!
jcr:root.courseTitle: The Complete Android Developer Course - Build 14 Apps
